name: Gaius Julius Caesar
title: Dictator
shortBio: Roman general and statesman who played a critical role in the transformation of the Roman Republic into the Roman Empire.

name: Augustus (Octavian)
title: Emperor
shortBio: First Roman Emperor, founder of the Principate, adopted son of Julius Caesar.

name: Trajan
title: Emperor
shortBio: Roman Emperor from 98 to 117 CE, known for expanding the empire to its greatest territorial extent.

name: Caracalla
title: Emperor
shortBio: Roman Emperor who issued the Edict of Caracalla, granting citizenship to all free inhabitants of the empire.

name: Constantine I
title: Emperor
shortBio: First Christian Roman Emperor, founder of Constantinople.

name: Romulus Augustulus
title: Emperor (West)
shortBio: Last Western Roman Emperor, deposed in 476 CE.

name: Constantine XI Palaiologos
title: Emperor (East)
shortBio: Last Byzantine Emperor, died defending Constantinople against the Ottoman siege.
